damaged.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

lore: Methodical and coldly emotionless killers, Fallen Nobles who pilot War Dog Executioners employ long-barrelled, rapid-firing cannons to maximise their kills. They eviscerate throngs of the enemy and hammer the foesâ€™ war engines into submission, seeking to reap ever greater murderous tallies than their peers.

otherAbilities.Executioner:: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a unit Below Half-strength , add 1 to the Hit roll .
